## Description
Brief description of changes made.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Phase 2A sync improvement
- [ ] Phase 2B development

## Testing
- [ ] Unit tests pass
- [ ] Integration tests pass (if applicable)
- [ ] Manual testing completed
- [ ] Phase 2A sync tests pass (if relevant)

## Checklist
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review of the code completed
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed
- [ ] Changes add no new warnings
- [ ] Any dependencies added are documented

## Phase 2 Considerations
If this relates to sync functionality:
- [ ] Vault binding validation considered
- [ ] Atomic publish behavior verified
- [ ] Store abstraction maintained
- [ ] Integration tests updated

## Additional Notes
Any additional context or notes about the pull request.
